entry.title: Our Most Read Stories This Week: Base Memecoins, AI Tokens Merge, Vitalik Calls for Mainstream, RWAs
entry.summary: The Defiant's most read stories for the week of March 25.

entry.title: Maker DAO To Reduce Borrowing Fees And Increase Spark Debt Ceiling
entry.summary: Fees will drop 2 ppts to 13%, while the debt ceiling will rise to $2.5 billion from $1 billion.

entry.title: Centrifuge’s Anemoy Attracts Investment From Celo As Tokenized Treasury Assets Bubble
entry.summary: Celo’s investment follows Frax and Gnosis passing proposals to deploy $20M and $10M into Anemoy.

entry.title: Memecoin Mania, SBF Sentenced 25 Years, $63M Hack, KuCoin In Trouble
entry.summary: Welcome to Crypto With Cami, your concise guide to the week's most significant developments in DeFi and Web3, all in 30 minutes or less.

entry.title: Vitalik Urges Ethereum Developers To Target ‘Millions’ Of Users Post-Dencun
entry.summary: Ethereum’s chief scientist said Ethereum is ready to support applications servicing millions of users following Dencun's massive L2 fee reductions.

entry.title: Prisma Finance Suffers $12 Million Exploit
entry.summary: The LRT-backed stablecoin protocol has been paused as the team investigates.

entry.title: Ondo Finance To Deploy OUSG Assets In Blackrock’s BUIDL Fund
entry.summary: The real-world asset protocol is also introducing instant subscriptions and redemption for its OUSG tokenized fund.

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Was Sentenced to 25 Years in Prison
entry.summary: That's less than what Federal prosecutors wanted, as they had sought for a sentence of 40 to 50 years.

entry.title: DEGEN Launches Arbitrum Orbit-Based Layer 3 Chain
entry.summary: The price of DEGEN is up more than 2,000% in 30 days.

entry.title: BlackRock Would Still Pursue Spot Ether ETF If Ethereum Cops Securities Designation
entry.summary: BlackRock’s CEO said the SEC classifying Ether as a security would not preclude spot Ethereum ETFs from entering the market.

entry.title: BlackRock’s Tokenized Treasuries Fund BUIDL Sucks Up $245M In First Week
entry.summary: The market cap of on-chain U.S. treasuries funds tagged new all-time highs amid BUIDL's success.

entry.title: Content Creators and Doomscrollers Are Getting Paid With Drakula
entry.summary: Alex Masmej is the founder of Drakula, a short form video content platform on Base that uses $DEGEN as its currency to reward creators and users. Nearly four years ago, we welcomed Alex on The Defiant. Today, we reconnect to explore the journey and developments Alex has embarked upon since relocating to San Francisco. In this episode, we dive deep into his latest project, Drakula.

entry.title: Ethena Labs Announces Airdrop Date of Native Token ENA
entry.summary: Starting April 2, 750 million ENA or 5% of the total supply, will get airdropped.

entry.title: Arbitrum and Azuki Join Forces to Create New Anime Blockchain
entry.summary: The collaboration spawned AnimeChain.

entry.title: AltLayer Launches ALT Staking
entry.summary: Rollup provider aims to provide fast finality with its MACH Alpha product built atop EigenLayer.

entry.title: Mantle Launches Rewards Portal With Ethena Shards Up For Grabs
entry.summary: The Layer 2’s MNT token surged 40% after a listing on Korean exchange Upbit.

entry.title: U.S. Judge Rules SEC Lawsuit Against Coinbase Can Move Forward
entry.summary: The judge has ruled that through its staking program, Coinbase has operated as an unregistered intermediary of securities.

entry.title: Fetch, SingularityNET, and Ocean To Merge Assets and Forge Shared ‘Tokenomic Network’
entry.summary: The three projects hope to accelerate decentralized AI development.

entry.title: Nomura’s Laser Digital Unveils Institutional Polygon Fund Embracing Liquid Staking
entry.summary: Investors will earn yields from validating Polygon chains and DeFi through TruFin’s MATIC liquid staking token

entry.title: Analysts Believe Munchables’ $63M Exploit Was Internally Engineered
entry.summary: Experts believe the Blast-based game’s $63 million hack may have been devised by a North Korean employee.

entry.title: Major Crypto Exchange KuCoin Faces U.S. Criminal Charges
entry.summary: Authorities claim that KuCoin flouted U.S. anti-money laundering laws in pursuit of growth.

entry.title: DEX Trading Volumes on BNB Chain Flip Ethereum and Solana
entry.summary: Crypto markets bounce back from last week’s rout, with Bitcoin and Ether reclaiming $70,000 and $3,600, respectively.

entry.title: SEC Faces Lawsuit Seeking To Exempt Airdrops From Securities Classification
entry.summary: The DeFi Education Fund teamed up with Beba Collection, a small apparel company, in a bid to get regulatory clarity from the courts on airdrops.

entry.title: Badger Launches 0% Interest Bitcoin Lending Protocol eBTC
entry.summary: Badger leverages stETH as collateral to generate staking yield for both the eBTC protocol and borrowers.

entry.title: Bridging East and West in Crypto | Erica Kang of KryptoSeoul
entry.summary: Erica Kang is the CEO and founder of KryptoSeoul, a leading community building team in South Korea that focuses on blockchain projects. Erica has been a bridge between the East and the West for a very long time. Before we dive into all of that, Erica will share a little bit about how she first got involved in the crypto community.

entry.title: Exploring the Ex-Apple Engineer Led Sui Network
entry.summary: Evan Cheng is the Co-founder & CEO at Mysten Labs, which is the team behind Sui Network. In their words, Sui is a Layer 1 blockchain and smart contract platform "designed to make digital asset ownership fast, private, secure, and accessible". In our conversation we explore the potential of this up and coming Layer 1 by learning about the underlying motivation of the founder, what makes it different from other blockchains, in particular Aptos, the current main uses cases, and more.

entry.title: Game Theory, Market Cycles, Investment Mentality, Mantle Network with Jordi Alexander
entry.summary: Jordi Alexander is the founder of Selini Capital, a trading and venture investing firm focused on digital assets. He's also focused on the Mantle Network, a modular Layer 2 EVM-compatible blockchain that uses optimistic rollups. But before venturing into crypto Jordi was a professional poker player and an expert in game theory.
